column1: Xiaolingwei (Chinese: 孝陵卫) is a city located in Jiangsu
column3: and is near Nanjing. It is south of Nanjing's Zhongshan Gate and southeast of the Ming Dynasty imperial tombs of Nanjing. The city has a population of 66
column5: making it the 35th largest city in Jiangsu. It operates on the CDT time zone
column6: the same as Nanjing. It is situated 14 meters above sea level.

column1: Xiaolingwei is 227 kilometers away from Shanghai and 888 kilometers away from Beijing.
